aboutCompany.paragraph: Home Minister Shri Amit Shah Speaking on the Ideology of the BJP

circle.title: 40 years in Public Life
circle.desc: Journey from a polling booth worker to Union Home Minister
circle.dropdown: Extra details about his 40 years journey in politics and public service.

cards.title: People’s Person
cards.desc: 25 years as elected representatives serving people as MLA, MP-RS, MP-LS

cards.title: Facilitator of Change
cards.desc: Eight years as Minister in Gujarat Government & exemplary work as Union Minister for Home and Cooperation

cards.title: Contributor in Nation Building
cards.desc: A Firm Believer in Indian Culture & Ethos
cards.dropdown: He has contributed significantly in building the nation.

cards.title: Organization Builder: Six Years as National President of BJP
cards.desc: Making BJP world’s largest party and building an invincible election machine

cards.title: Sports Administrator
cards.desc: Taking Cricket & Chess in Gujarat to greater heights

cards.title: Pioneer of Cooperative Moment in Gujarat
cards.desc: Important role in bringing cooperative moment at the centre stage of Gujarat Economy

timeline.title: National Coordinator, Cooperative Wing, BJP
timeline.desc: In 2001, Amit Shah was appointed as the National Coordinator of the Cooperative Wing of Bharatiya Janta Party. During this...

timeline.title: Political Journey Continues
timeline.desc: In 2002, he took part in major state-level campaigns and strengthened the party structure.

timeline.title: Leadership Role
timeline.desc: In 2006, he expanded his leadership role within the organization.

timeline.title: National Presence
timeline.desc: By 2009, he gained recognition as a key strategist.

stalwartSlider.text: Shri Amit Shah Ji is rich in energy, hard work, knowledge & efficiency
stalwartSlider.author: Former Finance Minister, Arun Jaitley

stalwartSlider.text: He is making tremendous efforts to ensure a safe and secure India
stalwartSlider.author: Defense Minister, Rajnath Singh

stalwartSlider.text: What Shri Amit Shah Ji did in Mission Kashmir operations is really commendable because it takes immense courage to carry out such activities.
stalwartSlider.author: Actor, Rajinikanth

stalwartSlider.text: Shri Amit Shah Ji is extremely dynamic and has got the clarity of vision and devotion to do the welfare of the country.
stalwartSlider.author: Former Vice President, Venkaiah Naidu
